column2: I found the dark bustling ambiance to be pleasant
column3: and our server was very nice. I went with the 6 course vegetarian tasting menu ($65)
column4: which they were happy to prepare vegan for me. The courses were mostly mediocre at best
column5: with the highlights being the cold vegetable salad
column6: and eggplant nigiri. These were excellent-rich savory flavors and perfectly cooked fresh vegetables. Everything else was too salty
column7: and too simple for this price point. My friends got a variety of fish sushi and did not enjoy any of it
column8: which was disappointing to hear from sushi lovers! While I appreciate the availability of vegan options at Uchi
column9: I would not come back here.
